review: arcanum is a bit rough around the edges due to its old age and limited budget but its still a masterclass in immersive world design and player freedom that still hasnt been matched to this day it might take a while to get into it but reading the manual before you start the game will help a lot   definitely give this a try if you like roleplaying games for the actual roleplaying aspect
game_title: Arcanum: Of Steamworks and Magick Obscura

review: one of the best rpgs of all time dont play vanilla though drogs uap is the way to go

review: im having a lot of fun so far my only complaint is how poorly optimized the game is for modern windows 10 i dont mind archaic graphics at all but the weird  lag spikes get to be annoying at times especially when theres no settings to change any thing performance wise  still game is 50x better than all the slop being churned out by studios today
game_title: Arcanum: Of Steamworks and Magick Obscura

review: ddstyle fantasy think baldurs gate 1  2 with an industrial revolution twist has kind of a steampunk vibe  some really fun and unique character backgrounds that can totally change how you play the game depending on which one you pick  tes 3 morrowind levels of fantasy racism so if you like to play underdog characters this game is for you
